Description: Flint tool/implement on tabular flint, rectangular in shape, orange cortex remaining on both sides, flaked in places on both sides.
Bibliographic references: Brunton 1937 / Mostagedda and the Tasian Culture (p. 17; pl. 27.4) ((marked 2800 in error))
Exhibition history: 2019-2023, Oxford, Ashmolean Museum of Art & Archaeology, Loan for study: prehistoric Egyptian (Badrian) lithic artefacts
